title: Burning Suspicion
description: In this Dateline classic, investigators question what went wrong when a young wife and mother is found dead after a house fire in a small Kansas town. Was it an act of murder? Keith Morrison reports. Originally aired on NBC on October 11, 2013.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
